title: Competency-Based Language Education Curriculum Design for Prospective Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational principles and intermediate-level expertise in language education
context.additional_context: Learners primarily participate in lectures via smartphones, receive competency checks through real-time interaction and formative assessments, and focus on improvement. The curriculum is centered on core competencies in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five or more competency-based teaching methodologies applicable to language instruction
Learners can create a single-session language lesson plan by applying learner-centered instructional design principles.
Learners can demonstrate the process of analyzing learning achievement using formative assessment tools (quizzes, feedback, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
